CustomField.description: Indicates if Current LPM is a partner with a prohibited selling status. Used in Dynamic Forms.
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Current_LPM__c, "Aderant"), "Aderant; ",null)& IF(INCLUDES(Current_LPM__c, "Firm Central"), "Firm Central; ", null)& IF(INCLUDES(Current_LPM__c, "ProLaw"),"ProLaw; ",null)& IF(INCLUDES(Current_LPM__c, "Thomson Reuters"), "Thomson Reuters; ", null)
CustomField.label: Current LPM Prohibited
